channel.title: finleye
channel.description: Brooklyn based developer and coffee enthusiast

item.title: Totally not Livejournal
item.description:
With less complaining than Tumblr, and fewer feelings than Livejournal, I hope to make something here I can be proud of. I’ll try to share things I learn while working on a side projects.

I’m working on my first post about a Sinatra app I started working on over the weekend. Where I realized that a lot of my Ruby knowledge turned out to actually be Rails knowledge. I’m getting know know Rack better, and hopefully I’ll figure out how I can host stuff without Heroku.

In the mean time, get to know me though my Twitter, Instagram, or GitHub. Fell free to reach out on any of those, or email me at finley.corey@gmail.com!
